Texts.Chs: 我把这事告诉了我的上司，他建议我去医务室看看。如果他不把我当回事，我就把他送到医疗室去。这里的气氛真是越来越紧张了。希望我们没有发生友军误伤事件。
Texts.Eng: I told my superior officer this and he suggested I visit the med bay. I'll send HIM to the med bay if he doesn't start taking me seriously. Tempers sure are getting frayed around here. Let's hope we don't have any friendly fire incidents.

Texts.Chs: 被困在地堡里。重复。我恳求我的上司让我去勘察地形，但他完全不同意。这一派胡言，他说。不，不是的！我经常看到其他物种在那里。就在昨天，我看到一只会走路会说话的鸟和一只大猴子在一起。
Texts.Eng: Stuck in the bunker. Again. Begged my superior officer to let me go and explore the terrain, but he was having none of it. It's hostile, he says. No it isn't! I see other species out there all the time. Just yesterday, I saw a walking, talking bird hanging out with a large monkey.
